meanings.sent1: After eating too much candy, she puked in the bathroom.
meanings.sent2: He puked after feeling sick from the roller coaster ride.
meanings.sent3: The dog puked up his dinner on the carpet, making a mess.
meanings.sent4: The overflowing river puked debris onto the shore after the storm.
meanings.sent5: The baby puked all over his bib, creating a colorful mess.

meanings.sent1: She puked all night after eating the spoiled food.
meanings.sent2: He puked in the car on the way to the hospital.
meanings.sent3: The clown puked confetti during the funny magic show.
meanings.sent4: The volcano puked lava and ash into the sky during the eruption.
meanings.sent5: The old man puked memories of his youth as he looked at the photo album.
